```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(scales)
library(tidytext)
library(textdata)
library(broom)
library(dslabs)
```

```{r}
df_tweets <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aksoralis/Data-Mining/main/df_tweets.csv")
stocks <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aksoralis/Data-Mining/main/stocksdf.csv")
tweets <- df_tweets %>% select(tweet, link, replies_count, likes_count, retweets_count, day)

tweets <- tweets %>% rename(Date = day)
clean <- left_join(tweets,stocks, by= "Date")

clean <- clean %>% 
           filter(Date >= ymd("2017-11-10"))
```


```{r}
clean %>% count(year)

```
